Container.Name: Daapd-Server
Container.Changes:
[center][img width='300px' src='http://i117.photobucket.com/albums/o43/sparklyballs_album/Fubar/sparklyballs2.gif'][/center]
[center][font size=5]Daapd-Server Change Log[/font][/center] [font size=4]2015-07-09[/font] - Initial Release - Clean up build-deps - Updated version of config file - Moved log/databases/cache to subfolder of /config, that thing got big QUICKLY, lol. - Changed DBUS extra parameter to read only
Container.Description: Server that allows you to play your music folders in itunes without importing them, map /music to your library and /config to your appdata share.
Container.Overview: Server that allows you to play your music folders in itunes without importing them.
